mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Virginia Pavilion Gardens, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Griswold, Ralph E. (Ralph Esty) (American landscape architect, 1894-1981) [landscape architect]
Hopkins, Alden (landscape architect, 1905-1960) [landscape architect]
Jefferson, Thomas (American statesman, architect, and draftsman, 1743-1826) [architect]
Parker, Donald H. (American landscape architect) [landscape architect]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Garden spaces laid out and enclosed by Jefferson's design for the use of the Pavilion and Hotel occupants. West gardens reconstructed by Garden Club of Virginia to designs by Alden Hopkins, 1948-1952. East gardens reconstructed by Garden Club to designs by Donald H. Parker and Ralph E. Griswold, 1952-1965. -- Wilson/Neuman/Butler, University of Virginia Campus Guide, 2nd ed. 2012. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
